tool.name: SDF to Fingerprint
tool.description: extract fingerprints from sdf files metadata

param.name: infile
param.label: SDF file with fingerprints as metadata

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
Read an input SD file, extract the fingerprints and store them in a FPS-file.
-----
.. class:: infomark
